language.description: With this command you can change the server language.
language.list: Add argument to list available languages (if set no config get overwritten)

setup.description: Setup command for the temp voice bot. Uses Joined channel and parent category if no ID's specified.

options.lobby: The channel id of a voice channel to join when creation of channel is needed
options.category: The channel id of a category where the channels are created ( the lobby should be in there )

voicechat.description: You can edit your channel with this command

options.target: @User - The user you want to exclude.

name.description: Change the name of your channel. ( Up to 64 chars )

options.name: A new name for the channel. ( Up to 64 chars )

limit.description: Change the user limit restrictions of your channel ( 2-99 )

lock.description: This command prevents the channel to let in new members

unlock.description: This command makes the channel joinable for new members
